One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.

From the base of basis; profound, literally or figuratively.
Early dawn, day-break. From the same as oros; dawn; by extension, morn.

str2: To carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known. A primary verb.

str2: To make ready, prepare. From hetoimos; to prepare.
